revised_title: Transmission of Amakebe by Rhipicephalus appendiculatus: Identifying the Brown Tick as a Vector for East Coast Fever
tldr: The author investigates the transmission of Amakebe, a disease in calves, by the brown tick Rhipicephalus appendiculatus. Through experiments, they successfully transmit the disease to susceptible calves, confirming the brown tick as a vector for East Coast fever.
